question: Who of the following was the viceroy of India when the Communal Award was announced?
explanation: Communal Award was announced in the year 1932 (16th August) byÂ  British prime minister Ramsay MacDonald. Communal Award was announced to introduce separate electorates for Hindus, Muslims, Sikhs and Untouchables. Lord Willingdon was the viceroy of India at that time.
